title: [Bug]: Failed to start.
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

Failed to start. OS is Linux MInt Mate 22 (Ubuntu 24)

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.14

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
teams-for-linux 
No config file found, using default values
Initialising logger with config: {"transports":{"console":{"level":"info"},"file":{"level":false}}}
15:51:07.485 › configPath: /home/nail/.config/teams-for-linux
15:51:07.568 › (node:105510) [DEP0180] DeprecationWarning: fs.Stats constructor is deprecated.
(Use `teams-for-linux --trace-deprecation ...` to show where the warning was created)
MESA-INTEL: warning: Ivy Bridge Vulkan support is incomplete
libva error: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/dri/iHD_drv_video.so init failed
[105510:0609/155107.751663:ERROR:browser_main_loop.cc(276)] Gtk: gtk_widget_add_accelerator: assertion 'GTK_IS_ACCEL_GROUP (accel_group)' failed
[105510:0609/155107.751832:ERROR:browser_main_loop.cc(276)] Gtk: gtk_widget_add_accelerator: assertion 'GTK_IS_ACCEL_GROUP (accel_group)' failed
[105510:0609/155107.751905:ERROR:browser_main_loop.cc(276)] Gtk: gtk_widget_add_accelerator: assertion 'GTK_IS_ACCEL_GROUP (accel_group)' failed
[105510:0609/155107.751963:ERROR:browser_main_loop.cc(276)] Gtk: gtk_widget_add_accelerator: assertion 'GTK_IS_ACCEL_GROUP (accel_group)' failed
[105510:0609/155107.753900:ERROR:browser_main_loop.cc(276)] Gtk: gtk_widget_add_accelerator: assertion 'GTK_IS_ACCEL_GROUP (accel_group)' failed
15:51:08.050 › assignOnDidFailLoadEventHandler : {} - -100 - ERR_CONNECTION_CLOSED
15:51:08.050 › (node:105510) electron: Failed to load URL: https://teams.microsoft.com/v2 with error: ERR_CONNECTION_CLOSED
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
